46 
47 //Figure out if building a DLL or Shared Object (TODO check if .so?)
48 #if defined(_IVR_IS_BUILDING) && defined(_WINDLL)
49  #define IVR_IS_DYNAMIC
50 #endif
51 
52 // Set up calling conventions and DLL import/export to intermediate _IVR_API(x) macro
53 #ifndef IVR_IS_DYNAMIC
54  #define _IVR_API(x) x
55 #elif defined _WIN32 || defined __CYGWIN__ // On Windows
56  #ifdef _IVR_IS_BUILDING // Building the library as DLL
57  #ifdef __GNUC__ // Using GCC on Windows
58  #define _IVR_API(x) __attribute__((dllexport, cdecl)) x
59  #else // Using MSVC or MinGW
60  #define _IVR_API(x) __declspec(dllexport) x __cdecl
61  #endif
62  #else // Using the library
63  #ifdef __GNUC__ // Using GCC on Windows
64  #define _IVR_API(x) __attribute__((dllimport)) x
65  #else // Using MSVC or MinGW
66  #define _IVR_API(x) __declspec(dllimport) x __cdecl
67  #endif
68  #endif
69 #else // On Linux or some other unsupported OS
70  #if __GNUC__ >= 4 // If visibility attribute is available (GCC >= 4.0)
71  #define _IVR_API(x) __attribute__((visibility("default"))) x
72  #else // Unknown setup, don't do anything.
73  #define _IVR_API(x) x
74  #endif
75 #endif
76 
77 // Public IVR_API(x) definitions
78 #ifdef __cplusplus
79  #define IVR_API(x) extern "C" _IVR_API(x)
80 #else
81  #define IVR_API(x) _IVR_API(x)
82 #endif
83 
84 // Files included whenever "ivr.h" is included:
85 
86 #include "ivr/error.h"
